column4: i have a e machine with a geforce 6150se nforce 430  , with driver 173.14.22 activated whne it asked me to restart the resolution changes to 640x480. and i can hardly navigate my windows as they dont fit in the screen any i dea how to fix this?
run the nvidia-settings tool and set a higher res.
nvidia-settings   is the name of the binary. run it from terminal if you want'  'gksudo nvidia-settings'
